hi,

using version 1.12.1. changing any other default setting is written to=

order.xml file of the given profile, but after adding a
urlcanonicalizatio=
n rule,  the changed value of the regex rule is not
saved to profile file. =
upon saving the profile, it is always written
as the default value as seen =
below, so hardcoding it into order.xml
does not work -eventually it will be=
 overwritten on the next save-,
except writing the rule into the java sourc=
e.

<newObject name=3D"regex"
class=3D"org.archive.crawler.url.canonicalize=
.RegexRule">
        <boolean name=3D"enabled">true</boolean>
        <stri=
ng name=3D"matching-regex">(.*)</string>
        <string name=3D"format">${=
1}</string>
        <string name=3D"comment"/>
</newObject>

any suggestion=
s?
